Posts.Content: LTK wrote: My parents are coming into town to help w/ my 2 young kids, and I'm trying to figure out how long to ask them to stay.  We need to arrange accommodations ahead of time.  On Feb.10th I'm having a unilateral mastectomy with immediate implant and sentinel node biopsy.  Thanks for any input. Dx 12/11/2009, DCIS Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: How long did you feel sore after mx, snb, and implant? LTK mawhinney

Posts.Content: Jan 29, 2010 06:44AM LTK wrote: Hi, Faith It's LTK here, from the February club.  I just spotted this post and want to learn about these camisoles, too.  Hope someone answers your questions.  I myself don't know anything about these camisoles.  Is this in lieu of a fanny pack for holding the drain?  Or for support?  Or what?  My breast surgeon didn't say anything about it.  I just emailed her office yesterday to ask specifically how I should be preparing for surgery, and got no mention of camisoles.  Clue me in, please!
Posts.Title: How long did you wear the camisoles? Faith316 Magister105
